WorkItem.Description:
Hi All,

I have problem in print the document which i installed in iis 7.0

I have create a project on print the document which work fine local system, but when i host this project to IIS 7.0 window server 2008 , it shows the processing ..., no response from printer, actually printer is connected to that server.

i have googled everthing, is iis 7.0 is not any take printer to print the document ?

Code works fine in local system but in IIS not working Why?
WorkItem.Summary: Printing Problem, when project is hosted in IIS7.0

Comments.Message:
